sections.text: The Mayor shall form a task force for the following purposes:
Taking steps to educate the public about fraud, including telephone fraud;
Sharing information related to telephone fraud with District government agencies;
Sharing information related to telephone fraud with other state and federal law enforcement agencies; and
Advising the Mayor on enforcement of the provisions of this subchapter.
The task force may include representatives from the following agencies:
Department of Consumer and Regulatory Affairs;
Any other agency the Mayor deems appropriate.
